I'm wondering, is there a year zero in your calendar, or does it start at year 1 like the traditional calendar does? The reason I ask is if there is a year 0, then all decades, centuries, millennia can start on the zeroth year rather than the first year of that decade. So in the traditional calendar the first year of the 2000's decade was actually 2001, rather than 2000 itself. For the 2010's, it was 2011 rather than 2010, etc.
